text: The Max-Morlock-Stadion is a football stadium in the southeast of Nuremberg, Germany. Since the 1963/1964 season, the stadium has been the home ground of 1. FC NÃ¼rnberg. The stadium has 48,553 seats. During the soccer World Cup 2006, the stadium was called "Frankenstadion". == Other websites == * Official website Category:Buildings and structures in Bavaria Category:Football stadiums in Germany Category:Nuremberg Category:Sport in Bavaria
title: Frankenstadion
